text: Barbara Hamilton was a pioneering American woman drag racer. In 1963, she was the first woman licensed by the National Hot Rod Association (NHRA) to race a supercharged gasser.Burgess, Phil, National Dragster editor. "Carol Cox: NHRA's first class winner", written 4 May 2018, at NHRA.com (retrieved 16 September 2018) == Notes == Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:living people Category:Dragster drivers Category:Female dragster drivers Category:American female racing drivers Category:American racing drivers
title: Barbara Hamilton (drag racer)
